mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT member_rank AS memberRank FROM member LIMIT 1,5

SELECT m.member_code , m.member_name , member_online_id , member_phone_number , institution_code , institution_name , mo.member_rank , member_date FROM member AS m INNER JOIN member_online AS mo ON m.member_code = mo.member_code WHERE institution_code = #{institutionCode} AND mo.member_rank = #{memberRank} ORDER BY member_date
SELECT institution_code , institution_name FROM institution LIMIT 1,100

SELECT m.member_code , m.member_name , member_online_id , member_phone_number , institution_code , institution_name , mo.member_rank , member_date FROM member AS m INNER JOIN member_online AS mo ON m.member_code = mo.member_code WHERE institution_code = #{institutionCode} ORDER BY member_date
